text.text_translated:
I worked five days a week before. Then I had time off for my baby. After that, I wanted more time with my children. They will start school soon.

I talked to my manager. We agreed. I would work three days a week. This meant I got less money. They pay me for the hours I work.

But then I saw something. My work did not get smaller. Now I do five days of work. I do it in three days. I get much less money for it.

feedback.feedback: PASS: The text successfully meets all A2 readability requirements. It accurately conveys the original message without factual errors, as confirmed by the MeaningBERT score of 0.7741 and BERTScore of 0.9015. The CEFR classifier correctly identified the text as A2. The vocabulary is consistently at an A1/A2 level, with no complex words detected. Sentence structures are short and simple, using basic connectors appropriate for A2. This is a well-executed simplification.

best_attempt.text_translated:
I worked five days a week before. Then I had time off for my baby. After that, I wanted more time with my children. They will start school soon.

I talked to my manager. We agreed. I would work three days a week. This meant I got less money. They pay me for the hours I work.

But then I saw something. My work did not get smaller. Now I do five days of work. I do it in three days. I get much less money for it.
